scripts.build:sync-files: rsync -av --delete ../shared/assets dist/shared && rsync -av --delete ../shared/locales dist/shared && rsync -av --delete ../shared/templates dist/shared
scripts.test: firebase emulators:exec --only firestore,storage,functions --project social-income-staging --config ../firebase.json 'npm run test:app'
scripts.test:playwright: firebase emulators:exec --project social-income-staging --only firestore --config ../firebase.json --import ../seed  'npx playwright install --with-deps && playwright test'
scripts.test:playwright:update: firebase emulators:exec --project social-income-staging --only firestore --config ../firebase.json --import ../seed  'npx playwright install --with-deps && playwright test --update-snapshots'
